amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the funding for the Yucca Mountain Nuclear Waste Disposal Plan and apply the $150 million in savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in the Congressional Record to strike the funds for the Yucca Mountain Nuclear Waste Disposal Plan and apply the amount ($150 million) to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 75 - 344 (Roll no. 382).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 75 - 344 (Roll no. 382).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A031) offered by Ms. Titus.
